action.action-desc: Mr. Kind (for himself, Ms. Schwartz, and Ms. Esty) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the method by which the Social Security Administration determines the validity of marriages under title II of the Social Security Act.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Social Security and Marriage Equality Act
.

section.header: Determination of valid marriage under the Social Security Act

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to all final determinations of family status made after June 26, 2013.
